item.title: 14 New Lecturer/Senior Lecturer Positions
item.description:
The School of Computer Science and Informatics at Cardiff University (Wales, United Kingdom) is now recruiting for 14 posts at the levels of Lecturer (~Assistant Prof) or Senior Lecturer (~Associate Prof) in several areas of Computer Science, including Natural Language Processing (NLP).

Further details can be found here:

  • Lecturer (Teaching & Scholarship)
  • Lecturer (Teaching & Research)
  • Senior Lecturer (Teaching & Scholarship)
  • Senior Lecturer (Teaching & Research)

Application Deadline: Friday, 7 October 2022.

item.title: New Research Associate Position
item.description:
We are looking for a Research Associate for a UKRI Future Leaders Fellowship project on Natural Language Processing titled “Unsupervised background knowledge for language understanding”.

For an informal discussion about the role, please contact Jose Camacho Collados (Senior Lecturer) – camachocolladosj@cardiff.ac.uk.

Application Deadline: September 4th

Start Date: January 2023 (flexible)

item.title: New Teaching Associate Position
item.description:
Applications are invited for nine Teaching Associate posts in the School of Computer Science & Informatics at Cardiff University. Posts are available on a part-time (0.5FTE) basis. Part-time posts will be accompanied with the opportunity to also study towards a PhD part-time.

For an informal discussion about the role please contact Dr Martin Chorley - ChorleyMJ@cardiff.ac.uk

Application Deadline: September 7th

item.title: New Research Assistant Position
item.description:
We are looking for a Research Assistant for a UKRI Future Leaders Fellowship project on Natural Language Processing.

For an informal discussion about the role, please contact Jose Camacho Collados (Senior Lecturer) – camachocolladosj@cardiff.ac.uk.

Application Deadline: July 11th

Start Date: September 2022 or later (flexible)

item.title: Expressions of Interest for Cardiff NLP Summer Workshop 2022
item.description:
We are happy to officially announce the 1st Cardiff NLP Summer Workshop on June 30 and July 1!

This workshop will be an opportunity for participants to interact and attend talks/tutorials from high-profile NLP researchers from industry and academia.

Registration is free. Submit your Expression of Interest by May 30. More information here.

item.title: 1st Cardiff NLP Summer Workshop
item.description:
We are organising a free in-person 2-day Natural Language Processing workshop in Cardiff from June 30 to July 1. We will have invited speakers, tutorials, networking, etc.

More information coming soon! For now, safe the date!

item.title: Looking for PhD Students!
item.description:
Do you aim to make information more accessible to everyone? I am looking for students to work on different tasks for text adaption (e.g. Text Simplification, Readability Assessment, etc.).

You could either apply to one of the School of Computer Science studentships (Deadline 29/04), or be self-funded. Do not hesitate to get in touch if you’re interested!
